name: Riot Village
description:
Welcome to Riot Village

NOTE: If the game shows an initial black screen after pressing 'Run Game' , wait for 10 seconds or so for it to load. It's not broken!

How To Play

  •  Fulfil the ever-increasing demands of the villagers, or lose your throne!
  • Drop bread to feed villagers who are hungry, before they start rioting. 
  • Arrest rioting villagers before they can spread their anger and cause anarchy. 
  • Aim for the highest score, before this unstable society inevitably crashes down on your head. 

 Controls

  • Mouse Left Click On Items To Select Them
  • Mouse Left Click On Villagers To Feed/Arrest Them

Background Info

This project was made for Ludum Dare #49. It's a contest where you have a weekend to make a game. The theme was "Unstable". The engine used was Unity.
